EmailTemplate.description: BI-EMEA S&P Re-imbursement request to third parties (eg Reck, Whs, Plant)
EmailTemplate.name: BI-EMEA S&P Reimbursement request RECK - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for reimbursement (case: {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir, Madam,
Please find enclosed all documents necessary to start reimbursement procedure for claim reference {!Case.CaseNumber}.
May I kindly ask you to send me your feedback accompanied by your reference number by return?
Looking forward to receiving your positive feedback, I thank you for your cooperation.
Friendly Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
QN & Warranty Assistant
Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone}
{!Case.OwnerEmail}
